review_blob: Standard head and amber color; not cloudy. Soft taste, almost like its not a true heavy IPA. Nice crisp, sweet aftertaste. Solid beer, but nothing special.
beer_name: Dogfish Head Life & Limb Rhizing Bines

review_blob: Fantastic nose. Deeply bitter and hoppy from first sip, which is to be expected based on the name. Unbalanced; piney taste without malty undertone. Lingering taste. Very good but not excellent.

Hazy amber pour with an off white head. Heavy hoppiness balanced with heavy malt; hops not overwhelming. Pungent cheese taste more prevalent than citrus IMO. Strong bitter finish, but goes down relatively smooth. Nice bang at 10% abv. I would get this again.
